module.name: United Canadian American States

version.name: General UCAS
version.story: $real was born somewhere in the UCAS, in a city like $UCASORIGIN , or one of the many other places that no-one cares about.

version.name: Canada
version.story: $real was born in the tiny sliver of the northern UCAS that was once Canada.

version.name: Denver (UCAS Sector)
version.story: $real was born in the UCAS exclave making up one sixth of Denver, Colorado.

version.name: Seattle
version.story: $real was born in the UCAS exclave of Seattle, the UCAS’s only pacific port.

version.name: SINless
version.story: While born in the UCAS, $real is a citizen of nowhere, for one of several reasons.

module.story: Allan, please add story UCAS

module.name: Confederation of American States
module.story: $real was born in the Confederation of American States, a nation formed after the south finally got around to rising again.

module.name: Tír Tairngire
module.story: $real was born in Tir Tairngire, $TIRDESC .

module.name: Native American Nations
module.story: $real was born in the northern part of America, in the Native AMerican Nations

module.name: Arcology Living
module.story: $real was $LUCK enough to grow up in an Arcology: a corporate fortress city that $ARCOLOGY.

module.name: Corp Drone
module.story: $real was $LUCK enough to be the child of wageslaves, who via endless hours of toil managed to keep a roof over $real ’s head.

module.name: Farm Living
module.story: $real spent their formative years on a farm, not moving around hay like the farmhands of yesteryear, but instead $FARMDESC.

module.name: Fugitive
module.story: $real spent their formative years with their parents as they ran away from $FLEE.

module.name: Isolated Rural Upbringing
module.story: $real grew up in an isolated portion of the wilderness like the rednecks of old.

module.name: Military Brat
module.story: $real grew up almost everywhere, shifted from place to place by their $PARRENT 's military duties.

module.name: Orphan
module.story: $real was an orphan, growing up either in a $ORPHAN or on the streets.

module.name: Rich Kid
module.story: $real was literally born with a gold spoon in their mouth, and looked down on those with silver spoons, as those could tarnish.

module.name: Street Urchin
module.story: $real was a child of the streets, best described with words like plucky or $INSULTA.

module.name: White Collar
module.story: $real had fairly well off parents who paid for a better than average education.

module.name: Corporate Education
module.story: $real was educated by a megacorp so that he might make a better wageslave when he graduated.

module.name: Farm Living
module.story: $real spent their teenage years on a farm, $FARMTASK .

module.name: Gang Warfare
module.story: $real spent their teenage years shooting at other teenagers just to gain control over a few city blocks. Just to be clear, $real was in a gang, not the Battle of Stalingrad.

module.name: High School
module.story: $real went to high school like a normal person.

module.name: Home Tutored
module.story: $real was taught at home, by $HOMEDESC . While they managed to avoid the main pitfall of homeschooling and somehow ended up with a better education than their peers, $real was left emotionally stunted due to the lack of contact with others.

module.name: Isolated Rural Upbringing
module.story: $real spent their teenage years in the middle of nowhere, leaving them with very little knowledge of the outside world, but a lot of knowledge about $OUTDOOR .

module.name: Magical Education (Magican)
module.story: $real was identified as awakened at an early age and was sent off to a wizarding school that, sadly, was much less awesome than Hogwarts.

module.name: Magical Education (Aspected)
module.story: $real was identified as awakened at an early age and was sent off to a wizarding school that, sadly, was much less awesome than Hogwarts.

module.name: Magical Education (Mystic Adept)
module.story: $real was identified as awakened at an early age and was sent off to a wizarding school that, sadly, was much less awesome than Hogwarts.

module.name: Magical Education (Adept)
module.story: $real was identified as awakened at an early age and was sent off to a wizarding school that, sadly, was much less awesome than Hogwarts.

module.name: Military School
module.story: $real was educated at a military school designed to instill discipline and patriotism in those $LUCK to be sent there.

module.name: Preparatory School
module.story: $real was $LUCK enough to go to a respected private school.

module.name: Street Kid
module.story: $real graduated summa cum laude from the school of hard knocks, with a major in $STREETDESC and a minor in women’s studies.

module.name: Skipped Further Education
module.story: $real either never received the opportunity for a further education, or decided it wasn't for them. Either way, the wide range of life's choices spread before them!

module.name: Community College
module.story: $real wanted to get something that resembled higher education, but couldn’t afford to go to a real college. The solution: community college.

module.name: Ivy League University
module.story: $real either had a scholarship or money to burn, because they managed to get into one of the most exclusive institutions in the country, gaining them a first class education, as well as something nice to put on their resume.

module.name: Military Academy
module.story: $real got into a military academy, where they trained to become a commissioned officer in the army of their country.

module.name: State University
module.story: $real was either not intelligent enough for the ivy league, or unable to afford it. Either way, they got into one of the many other colleges out there.

module.name: Trade/Technical School
module.story: Not even capable of making it into a community college, $real had to settle for a trade school, which taught practical things they could use in their future life.

module.name: Bounty Hunter
module.story: $real became a bounty hunter, stalking people who skip out on their bail. On the plus side, they might have gotten to star in a shitty reality trideo.

module.name: Celebrity
module.story: $real became famous because they $FAMOUSDESC .

module.name: Combat Correspondent
module.story: $real decided that muckraking with the Corp’s filth was too likely to get them silenced, so they decided to go for an easier job: covering foreign wars.

module.name: Corporate
module.story: $real got a job at $RMEGA , becoming another gear in the corporate machine.

module.name: Cover Operations
module.story: $real was an genuine secret agent, spying on $ENTITY for $ENTITY

module.name: Drifter
module.story: $real decided getting a job just wasn’t for them, instead choosing to couchsurf, or possibly live in their mother’s basement.

module.name: Ganger
module.story: $real became a criminal, their main income coming from selling other people’s cyber-VCRs, and occasionally mugging people and stealing the money they got by selling cyber-VCRs.

module.name: Government Agent
module.story: $real somehow managed to get a job with one of the few government organizations that hasn’t yet been privatized. Be it with the FBI, MI5, NSA, TAO, Unit 61398, or some other organization, they get to be paid less than normal people in return for working longer hours and being hated by everyone.

module.name: Law Enforcement
module.story: $real $COPDESC

module.name: Organized Crime
module.story: $real decided the best way to wealth and power was also the most brutal: organized crime. Specializing in $GANGDESC , $real became well known in the $GANGTYPE

module.name: Political Activist
module.story: $real was one of the most dangerous things in the world: an idealist. Working for a small policlub or interest group, they got arrested multiple times in their quest to make the world a better place.

module.name: Postgraduate Studies
module.story: $real surfaced from the waters of academia, looked at the real world, said nope, and went straight back into academia.

module.name: Private Investigator/Detective
module.story: $real overdosed on $CRIMEDESC decided to become a private investigator.

module.name: Regular Job
module.story: $real got a job, exchanging labor for currency like a normal person.

module.name: Shadow Work (Shadowrunner)
module.story: $real is more than a criminal for hire: they’re a very expensive criminal for hire, with multiple break-ins, kidnappings, and assassinations on their resume.

module.name: Street Magic
module.story: $real decided to put his awakened talents to some other use than for the corps.

module.name: Terrorist
module.story: $real decided activism is for fools. The only way to get your voice heard is force. Blowing up pubs, executing civilians, assassinations, $real has done it all.

module.name: Think Tank
module.story: $real is an intellectual whore, paid by megacorps to explain why $MEGAWHORE .

module.name: Tour of Duty (Mercenary)
module.story: $real worked as a mercenary, fighting for fun and profit instead of for freedom or prophets.

module.name: Tour of Duty (NAN)
module.story: $real signed on with the armed forces of one of the NANs, fighting to defend their freedom from $WARNAN .

module.name: Tour of Duty (Tír Tairngire)
module.story: $real was a greenshirt in service of the Tir, fighting to preserve quite possibly the most dysfunctional nation on the continent.

module.name: Tour of Duty (UCAS, CAS and CFS)
module.story: $real was a soldier in service of the UCAS, CAS or CFS, training and drilling for the day the Azzies push north through the NANs so that they might be ready to… liberate them.

module.name: Early Emergence
module.story: $real was coding before other kids could read, emerging as a technomancer around the age normal kids are working out that $ALPHABET

module.name: Part of the Machine
module.story: $real grew up among mechanics, and some of their skill brushed off on him. On the downside, so did a lot of $STICKY.

module.name: Hacker Club
module.story: $real grew up in a commune of hackers, who taught him the basics of hacking, and nothing else.

module.name: Technomancer Boarding School
module.story: $real was lucky enough that their Emergence was noticed by one of the more techno friendly corporations, who gave them a free scholarship to a school that taught them how to use their powers instead of just black bagging and vivisecting them to see how they tick.

module.name: Escaped Technomancer
module.story: $real was blackbagged by a corp who wanted to take $real apart and see how they tick. Fortunately, they managed to escape, and even got to keep most of their organs.

module.name: Hacker Assassin
module.story: $real serves the Old Man of the Mountain via the matrix, hitting their enemies with enough biofeedback to leave their enemies brain leaking out of their ears.

module.name: Hacker Hobbyst
module.story: $real hacks as a hobby, cracking code with nothing but sheer willpower and a lot of mountain dew.

module.name: High-Profile Hack
module.story: $real pulled off a big job. How big? I shit you not, they $HACKDESC .

module.name: IT Ace
module.story: $real had the misfortune to work as a sysadmin, an unappreciated job where one has to somehow fulfil requests made by people without even the most basic computer knowledge.

module.name: Matrix Ghost
module.story: $real is an expert at staying unseen in the matrix, especially when it comes to $MATRIXHIDE .

module.name: Otaku Time
module.story: $real was an Otaku. No, not a Japanese nerd, but instead a child of the Matrix. Thankfully, Crash 2.0 hit before they suffered Fading, leaving them as a Technomancer, allowing them to keep their odd connection to the matrix for the rest of their life.

module.name: Slave
module.story: $real was a slave, and spent their childhood $SLAVE

module.name: Bag of Organs
module.story: $real was used as a host for bioware, as implanting it in a metahuman is cheaper than keeping it on ice. One day, $real knew they would be killed, and their organs $BAGORGAN . On the other hand, free bioware! Score!

module.name: Child of the Shadows
module.story: $real ‘s parents were shadowrunners. At a young age, $real was learning important skills such as $SHADOWCHILD .

module.name: Test Subject
module.story: $real grew up a lab rat, used by mad scientists to test augmentations. On one hand, $real essence was irreparably shredded. On the other hand free ware! Score!

module.name: Factory Child Worker
module.story: $real was a child laborer in one of the few factories that hadn’t fully mechanized. Their pay almost managed to pay for limbs to replace those they lost via work. Almost.

module.name: Pit Fighter
module.story: $real fought in a blood sport, punching the shit out of other people for fun and profit.

module.name: Urban Brawler
module.story: $real fought in Urban Brawl, which, despite all appearances, is somehow not a blood sport. It did, however, teach them quite a lot of things about $URBANBRAWL .

module.name: Street Doc
module.story: $real may very well only have a doctorate in fine arts, if they have one at all, but they still somehow manage to make it as a street doc, as asking no questions and working on the cheap is considered more important than actual medical training in some circles. Zoidberg would be proud.

version.name: Greater Antilles
version.story: $real was born somewhere in the Greater Antilles area.

version.name: Lesser Antilles
version.story: $real was born in the tiny sliver of the Lesser Antilles region.

version.name: SINless
version.story: While born in the Caribbean, $real is a citizen of nowhere, for one of several reasons.

module.name: Shanghaied
module.story: $real was conscripted onto a ship.

module.name: Pirate Captain
module.story: $real was a crime boss of the sea.

module.name: Pirate Crewmember
module.story: $real was a pirate on the high seas.

module.name: Bocor Slave
module.story: $real was imprisoned with vodou, living life as a zombie.

module.name: Assassin's Apprentice
module.story: $real spent time as a triggerman's assistant.

module.name: Guardian Angel
module.story: $real had a change of heart and instead of killing people for money protected people for free.

module.name: Ritual Killer
module.story: $real used ritual magic to complete contracts. Quite scary.

module.name: Minor Wheelman
module.story: $real was driving before other kids could read the street signs, emerging as one of the best getaway drivers around the age normal kids were learning traffic signals

module.name: Shop Kid
module.story: Tinkering was what $real lived for. It started with simply identifying the limited cars in the neighborhood. From there scavenging parts and putting them back together. Totally self taught $real worked their way into shops if they weren't chased off

module.name: Booster
module.story: By the time $real was a teen, they were stealing cars to order, driving the boosts to any one of the chop shops in the city. Now, when $real sees a new car in the 'hood, what $real sees is the fee in Nuyen

module.name: Drone Hobbyist
module.story: $real flies drones in competitions around the city. Taking jobs using their drones on the side to help pay for upgrades

module.name: Getaway Driver
module.story: Need a driver for that job you want doing? Feel the need for a getaway? Contact $real at getawaydriver.me for all your driving needs, flat rates for routes inside [CITY]

module.name: Trid Stunt Driver
module.story: Need a driver for that TRI-D you're finanicing? Contact $real at actor-driver.me for all your driving needs.

module.name: Brothel Child
module.story: $real was brought up in a syndicate-run brothel with the help of $real's many "aunts". They taught $real to be polite and discreet, so as to never be seen by the clients, and some of the many languages $real heard during this time stuck with $real.

module.name: Con Prop
module.story: $real's parents were con artists, and the best thing to happen to them was $real. Who would ever suspect two doting parents and their lovely child? Who wouldn't pay attention to a terrified child that had "lost their parents"? With a cute animal or two added to the mix, $real could distract the best of them.

module.name: The Easiest Mark
module.story: $real's parents never saw it coming. $real sold them out and milked them for all they had. $real was the invincible, the best in the world... at least, according to $real's assessment. It wasn't a walk in the park to constantly stay under the law's radar, but $real managed, even with the occasional unwelcome thoughts about $real's parents creeping into $real's mind.

module.name: Mr. Johnson
module.story: $real is a professional Johnson. $real's job is to be the line between civilization - $real's corporation - and the necessary evil of the wild men, the savages of the street.

module.name: Spy
module.story: $real is a real spy, a working spy. $real is embedded where they need to be, undercover, and keeps an eye out for documents their handlers want, always being cautious, discreet, and misleading.

module.name: Escort
module.story: An escort is nothing as vulgar as a prostitute: prostitutes sell their flesh, $real sells an experience. $real knows how to set the mood, to build something up, to be something the rich and powerful must seem to have to earn and conquer.

module.name: Street Preacher
module.story: A flood is coming that will wash away the filth from the streets, and $real has a message of salvation to deliver. Their mission is paramount, they know it. $real understands that salvation comes from odd angles in these godless times, and that they might have to do unconventional things for the greater good. $real's body is strong, and their resolve is stronger.

random.zog: managed to hack into Zurich-Orbital Gemeinschaft Bank and transfer themselves an absurd amount of nuyen
random.god: killed an entire division of GOD operatives
random.kfc: stole KFC’s original secret mix of herbs and spices

macros.matrixhide: corporate board meetings paid porn sites .

random.wu: how to jump forward while dual wielding pistols and firing doves out of their ass
random.matrix: how cool they look in black

random.gun: which end of a gun bullets come out of
random.mage: why and how one geek mages
random.s3: why one must never deal with a dragon

random.nazi: one of two elf supremacist nations
random.prop: a magical utopia founded by elves, for elves
random.conspiracy: a fascist dictatorship run by undying tyrants who predate written histor

random.drone: repairing the drones that moved around hay for him
random.paranoia: skimming nutrients of the surface of algae vats
random.krill: maintaining the complex piping systems that kept gigantic batches of krill alive until they grew to maturity and could be compressed into nutrient rich cubes

random.butter: churning I Can’t Believe It’s Not Butter TM
random.meat: maintaining the chlorine tanks on the meat sterilizer

random.homeschooling: his parents, who were afraid that if they sent $real to school the school would vaccinate $real into atheism
random.tutor: a personal tutor, who understood the subjects better than the average teacher

random.aa: a AA corp, such as Monobe International or Docwagon
random.a: a single A corp, such as The People’s Republic of Vietnam

famousdesc.sports: moved a ball slightly better than all the other players
famousdesc.kim: … to be honest, we aren’t really sure why

random.justice: ’s great belief in justice drove them to join with the physical embodiment of that: the police.
random.real: realized that cops get to murder innocents with impunity and thought “Get me some of that!”

random.jap: extreme racism is good for national unity
random.gw: global warming is really a communist hoax
random.polut: pollution isn’t really that big of a deal
random.link: megacorps keeping material links of all their employees keeps people safe
random.azzie: human sacrifice is good for national unity

random.deus: was not taken over by a murderous AI bent on world domination
random.corp: provided for every need of its residents
random.runner: pampered its residents in an attempt to resign them to corp life

macros.magic: Then " $TEST " and a big can of whoopass
